parameters.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT d.id) as total_documents,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.document_type = 'service_manual' THEN d.id END) as service_manuals,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.document_type = 'service_bulletin' THEN d.id END) as service_bulletins,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.document_type = 'parts_catalog' THEN d.id END) as parts_catalogs,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.processing_status = 'completed' THEN d.id END) as completed_documents,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.processing_status IN ('pending', 'processing') THEN d.id END) as pending_documents,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) as total_chunks,
  COUNT(DISTINCT i.id) as total_images,
  COUNT(DISTINCT v.id) as total_videos,
  COUNT(DISTINCT l.id) as total_links,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN l.is_active = true THEN l.id END) as active_links,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ec.id) as total_error_codes,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ec.image_id IS NOT NULL THEN ec.id END) as error_codes_with_screenshots,
  COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) as total_products,
  COUNT(DISTINCT d.manufacturer) as total_manufacturers,
  MAX(d.created_at) as last_document_added,
  MAX(v.created_at) as last_video_added,
  MAX(ec.created_at) as last_error_code_added
FROM krai_core.documents d
LEFT JOIN krai_intelligence.chunks c ON d.id = c.document_id
LEFT JOIN krai_content.images i ON d.id = i.document_id
LEFT JOIN krai_content.videos v ON d.id = v.document_id
LEFT JOIN krai_content.links l ON d.id = l.document_id
LEFT JOIN krai_intelligence.error_codes ec ON d.id = ec.document_id
LEFT JOIN krai_core.products p ON d.id IN (
  SELECT document_id FROM krai_core.document_products WHERE product_id = p.id
);
